name: Tidewater Landscape, LLC
address: 1514 Mathis Ferry Rd Ste 105, Mt Pleasant, SC 29464, USA

reviews.author: Ellen Colehower
reviews.text:
John and his team are AMAZING!!
Design and planning was spot on. Customer service and communication made the process simple. Installation crew was friendly and professional. I highly recommend Tidewater Landscaping!!!

reviews.author: Mary Beall
reviews.text:
A good friend recommended John and his team at Tidewater Landscaping. Best recommendation ever.

John was very responsive, came right over to look at the job, gave us a detailed quote, talked us through his work plan, then went above and beyond to get us on his schedule. We asked for the moon and he and his team delivered.

Happy to recommend!

reviews.author: Jacob Conaway
reviews.text: John and his crew did a wonderful job.  They planted 20 Ligustrums along both sides of my fence, mulched, planted some additional plants out front of the home and did an absolutely wonderful job.  Best part to me was the communication.  Prompt, polite, on time and everything in between.  This is how you run a successful business.  Look no further than Tidewater Landscaping.

reviews.author: Kimberly Baker
reviews.text: We contracted John after seeing other jobs he had completed in our neighborhood. We were very impressed with his work. His patience with me as I decided which stone I wanted to use (changed my mind a couple times) was greatly appreciated. We are very happy with our new paver patio and walkway and looking forward to many years of enjoyment. John stands behind his work and is right here in Mount Pleasant. I know if I have any issues he will be here to help.

reviews.author: Christopher Pryor
reviews.text: I highly recommend Tidewater Landscapes. While we had a large project that included: installation of several retaining walls, paver installation, drainage work, and landscaping, John and his crew were up to the task. John's communication was excellent every step of the way. His friendly demeanor, flexibility, and professionalism really shown through. I will definitely plan to use John and his company for any future landscaping needs!

reviews.author: Rachel Thompson
reviews.text: They were absolutely amazing! Our lawn is BEAUTIFUL!! They came out and did sod and relaid the whole yard. Great communication, great pricing and great product.

reviews.author: Stefanie Cuebas
reviews.text: Bell's Landscaping did a top notch job sodding my lawn. The team was diligent in getting the job done professionally. Quality work. Great communication and quick to schedule the job as well. Josh and team were a pleasure to work with.

reviews.author: Matt Dabrowski
reviews.text: Josh Bell was extremely communicative and helped my wife and I work towards a budget for our new lawn and hardscaping project. When I started calling around, Josh was quick to show up and provided a proposal that I could review prior to starting the work. His crews finished the project ahead of schedule and did a great job cleaning up at the end of the 2.5 days. Glad we picked Bell's Landscaping for our project - looking forward to years to come with the new lawn! Definitely recommend - call Josh if you are thinking about a lawn/landscape project.

reviews.author: Laura vonZweck
reviews.text: They did an amazing job job! I’m so happy with the warm backyard looks now… They were very professional and did such great work. I’m so very pleased with it all! I would definitely recommend them to anyone!

reviews.author: Ryan
reviews.text: I have been both a customer, and a subcontractor for Bells Landscaping for quite some time now. Hands down the best customer service in the low country, Bell's sets the standard when it comes to expectation management, punctuality and communication. The cherry on top of all that is the outcome of the project! Thank you, I look forward to the next project!

reviews.author: Yvonne Nydigger
reviews.text:
The entire process with Palmetto was amazing. The initial consultation with Jason was exactly what we needed. He guided us with both design and plant selections, and we went with most of what he suggested. The project itself had an incredible group of workers. They worked tirelessly in really HOT conditions. The job had a few hiccups as plants needed to be exchanged, but there was never a problem. Even when I got a little picky about some plants, they quickly and happily met my expectations. Harrison, our hands-on guy was knowledgeable on plants, soil and even bugs! We give him 6*'s for his attentiveness... and lovely southern manners. The best part was watching our Palmetto arrive! And we absolutely love the end results...as do our neighbors.

Everything was completed within it estimated time, clean up was good, though we had to ask them to do a little more cleanup on some of the concrete left in the grass. We do have a few shrubs we're monitoring to make sure they didn't suffer from shock, but we know that Palmetto, Jason and his team will stand behind them.

We have already recommended them to our neighbors, and I'm sure we'll be seeing them around this spring.

Thank you Palmetto for our beautiful outdoor space!

reviews.author: J Dycus
reviews.text: One of the best experiences we’ve had.  Jason was so patient with us as we worked through different changes to get exactly what we wanted.  Planned an extended patio, a walkway, round planting beds, round patio with fire pit center and 6 pallets of sod.  Then, Benito and the crew installed exactly as rendered.  Hard working crew is an understatement as they finished everything within a week just as promised.  We love their work and our yard now.  There’s no question that we’ll call Palmetto Landscaping and Design for all our future landscaping jobs.

reviews.author: Lori Watson
reviews.text: Jason was great at explaining how the work was going to be done. He and the other workers listen to my ideas, and made it happen.  Inam happy with the work

reviews.author: Dan Quigg
reviews.text: We could not be more pleased with Palmetto Landscaping and Design. They designed and installed our patio as well sculpted our garden beds and installed new sod. The crew worked extremely hard even with the extra burden of record heat. The crew demonstrated time and time again their pride in their work. Elvis, the crew lead is that rare combination of creative and detailed (right brain and left brain). We would wholeheartedly recommend Palmetto.

reviews.author: Edward Johnston
reviews.text:
Quality oriented group! They exceeded my expectations with my new Hardscape patio and artificial turf install!
In fact this same group was able to haul in 400 tons of granite for my driveway and dirt for my workshop pad! They were on time and nice people. Will continue to do business with Griffin and crew!

name: New Leaf Landscape Construction
address: 4144 Rivers Ave, North Charleston, SC 29405, USA

reviews.author: John Miner
reviews.text: The New Leaf Landscape Construction team did a fabulous job in our complete re-landscaping.  They gave us a great design and the team did an excellent job implementing.  In addition, the crew was respectful, kept the job site clean, were quiet and friendly.  We are happy customers!

reviews.author: al schnier
reviews.text: New Leaf transformed our home in IOP into an oasis.  What was once a barren lot is now a lush tropical haven.  The crew is great & their attention to detail & care for our property shows.  Highly recommended!!

reviews.author: Ryan Wachstetter
reviews.text: I give New Leaf Landscaping Construction 5 stars out of 5! I live on the same street as their business. I had a small little project that I needed help with, and they came down here and completed it in about 1 hour. Kevin, and Eric, and their crew are some really awesome guys! I cleared out a 20 ft by 20 ft area of some really thick vines, bushes, and small trees by hand, which took me a couple weeks to do. But there was no way I could have gotten the stumps, and roots up, and leveled it out by hand with yard tools. They came down here and knocked it out for me in no time! I called around to a lot of places, and they absolutely gave me the best price in town!!! They do great work, are very professional, and care about their neighbors. I highly recommend New Leaf Landscaping Construction and will definitely use them again! My name is J.D. Bonds and I own Port City Painting LLC in North Charleston. I know my review says Ryan Wachstetter and that's because I bought my phone from him and his Google account is on this phone. He's my cousin. Ryan says they did a really great job too!

reviews.author: Deeanna Girard
reviews.text: We have used New Leaf for years now!  We are on a prominent corner and I can’t tell you how many people stop and take pictures of our lawn.  We have recommended you guys so many times!

reviews.author: Maro VanValer-Campbell
reviews.text:
I live in Wescott in the Farms. This is a relatively new company our HOA has hired and it has been nothing but headaches since they started a few months ago.

They have repeatedly skipped my house when doing the leaf blowing after moving. This leaves my patio covered in grass clippings and yard waste. I have written to the HOA to complain and have someone reach out and no one has ever reached out.

The final straw was two weeks ago. They came through with the mower and the edger. I noticed my clematis that has been growing up trellis for several years was wilted and looked like it was dying. I checked the base and it was completely severed, just inches above root.

I had to write 3 emails and escalate this to the HOA president to get a response. No one from this company has ever contacted me.

I noticed today they had done the same thing to my other clematis. Severed at the root. I’m not sure if this is just total negligence on their part or what.

They have also repeated hacked away at any plant that wasn’t actively blooming in my garden beds. Lots of lantana that had growing was hacked away and every time I get it to start growing again they come through and cut it away again.

I want my clematis replaced and them to stay out of my flowerbeds.
